content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
──────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage depot.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron plates (status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]).
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper plates (status: NO_INGREDIENTS; warnings: ["no ingredients to smelt"]; fuel inventory updated with coal [coal: 2] and energy at 1600).

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science pack(s) for research (automation), status: NO_POWER; electrical id updated to 2840.
- Connected small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5) and (10.5, 7.5) forming an electricity network.
- Electricity provided via ElectricityGroup with id=2840.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for electricity generation (status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]); neighbours include pipes at positions (3.5, 23.5), (4.5, 23.5) and (2.5, 24.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for steam production (status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]); fluid_box contains water (≈200 units at 15°), with connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); neighbours include pipes at positions (-7.5, 25.5) and (-7.5, 24.5); operating on fluid_system [9052].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction (status: WORKING); connection point at (-9.5, 23.5) with neighbours at positions (-8.5, 23.5), (-8.5, 22.5) and (-9.5, 23.5); part of fluid_system [9052].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9052 at position(-6.5, 20.5) (status: WORKING)
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9053 at position(-2.5, 20.5) (status: EMPTY)
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9054 at position(-0.5, 21.5) (status: EMPTY)
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9059 at position(-3.5, 23.5) (status: EMPTY)
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9058 at position(-7.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY)
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9063 at position(3.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY)
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9062 at position(2.5, 24.5) (status: EMPTY)
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=9065 at position(-0.5, 28.5) (status: EMPTY)
- Electricity connectivity is linked via ElectricityGroup with id=2840.

ERROR TIPS
──────────────────────
• Fluid System Connection Attempts:
  - Repeated attempts to supply water to the steam engine using various fluid_system IDs (latest attempts with 8708, 8751, 8794, 8837, 8880, 8923, 8966, 9009) have failed due to referencing non-active PipeGroups.
  - Tip: Verify that the selected fluid_system ID corresponds to an active, correctly positioned PipeGroup before initiating a connection.

• Unproductive Stabilization Waits:
  - Inserting 10-second delays after unsuccessful connection attempts has not mitigated the issue.
  - Tip: Assess the pipeline network’s stability and confirm proper alignment prior to applying wait periods to avoid redundant delays.

• Persistent Steam Engine Connection Failure:
  - Despite multiple connection attempts, the steam engine remains in a NOT_CONNECTED state.
  - Tip: Double-check that the steam engine’s connection points are correctly aligned with an active PipeGroup to ensure effective water input.
